alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 08 at 11:08AM AKDT until April 09 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times in falling and blowing snow. * WHERE...Through Portage Valley and Whittier. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Low density snow will easily blow around and reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds and snow will increase on Sunday morning with the heaviest snow and strongest winds in the late Sunday morning to early afternoon timeframe.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
